head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Fatally Shot

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Man Fatally Shot

body.head.byline: By Michelle O'Donnell (NYT); Compiled by John Sullivan

block.p: A 21-year-old man was shot last night in the Prospect-Lefferts Gardens section, the police said. The shooting occurred about 11 p.m. at 728 Rogers Avenue, near Lenox Road. The man, whose identity was not released by the police, was taken to Kings County Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.
